hochschule.name: Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München
Victoria International University of Applied Sciences (HWTK Berlin)

list.infotext:
Start of studies: winter semester

Course language: English

You can apply for the preliminary review documentation (VPD) all year round and it is valid for one year after issue.

You can find information about the degree program here: https://www.th-rosenheim.de/en/studies-and-further-education/courses-of-study/masters-degree-programmes/advanced-industrial-engineering

Please consider the special application procedure of Rosenheim Technical University of Applied Sciences. Uni-assist generates a preliminary review documentation (VPD) that you must upload together with your online application at TH Rosenheim. You can access the application portal here: https://cm.th-rosenheim.de/qisserver/pages/cs/sys/portal/hisinoneStartPage.faces

Please read the information on the following websites carefully! Here you will find information about the tuition fees of the Master's degree program, on scholarship opportunities, the mandatory mobility abroad within the degree program and the schedule of the program.

  • Website Advanced Methods in Particle Physics
  • Information on scholarship opportunities
  • Website Department of Physics
  • Further information about the degree program
  • Information about the application and the required application documents
  • Information about the language requirement

Please note: This is an English-language Master's degree program.

The programme will deepen and broaden the research potential and the knowledge base of graduate engineers. Engineering Bachelor courses especially in electronic, mechanical and manufacturing engineering are the required entry qualification. The MSc will provide advanced specialist training beyond the bachelor studies.

The course will provide research training in advanced engineering and engineering management. It will equip graduates with the skills to integrate advanced technology into a wide variety of industrial applications and research topics, e.g. control systems design, digital signal processing, advanced production technology.

The course will incorporate modern engineering technologies and major non-technical (e.g. management studies) elements, as both these areas are important aspects of modern industrial and engineering practice and research.

Please note the special application procedure at the University of Würzburg. Uni-assist generates a preliminary review document (VPD) of your university entrance qualification. This document has to be submitted together with all other necessary documents when you apply at the University of Wuerzburg.

Information regarding the application:

https://www.uni-wuerzburg.de/en/international/studying-in-wuerzburg/degree-programmes/application/

You can access the application platform directly over: https://wuestudy.zv.uni-wuerzburg.de.

Please note the special application procedure at the University of Würzburg. Uni-assist generates a preliminary review document (VPD) of your university entrance qualification. You can access the application platform directly over: https://wuestudy.zv.uni-wuerzburg.de .

Please note the special application procedure at the University of Wuerzburg. Uni-assist generates a preliminary review document (VPD) of your university entrance qualification. This document has to be submitted with all other necessary documents when you apply at the University of Wuerzburg.

You can access the application platform directly over: https://wuestudy.zv.uni-wuerzburg.de.

EU and EEA Citizens don’t need a VPD documentations but apply only via https://www.hochschulstart.de.

Who has to apply for preliminary documentation (VPD)?

All applicants for a Master's Degree who have obtained their university degree (e.g. a bachelor's degree) in a country other than Germany.


Information regarding the application process can be found here: https://ukoeln.de/RCCXV

The language of instruction is English. (Knowledge of German is not required for admission).

The Applied Neurosciences in Sports & Exercise master degree at University of Paderborn is taught in English and only starts in winter semester. The faculty provides the information content, structure and scope of the program whereas the International office shares information about application formalities and deadlines.

Details on consultation by e-mail or phone are available here.

All necessary information about this degree program as well as the admission requirements can be found on the webpage of the degree program.

Please note: For international students the application takes place exclusively online via uni-assist e.V.. Please submit your documents as an upload here. After successful evaluation and verification, you will automatically be registered in Anhalt University of Applied Sciences SSC applicant portal. An additional application at Anhalt University of Applied Sciences is therefore not necessary.

Applications for Architecture DUAL can be submitted online from October 1 until February 28 for a course beginning in the winter semester of the same year. There is a special admission procedure for Architecture DUAL. More details about the online application please find under Studieninteressierte - Online-Bewerbung (hs21.de). All our courses are offered in German language.
